article: A shepherd was herding his sheep when suddenly a brandnew sports car came out of a dust cloud towards him.The _ was a young man in a new designer suit,designer _ ,designer sunglasses and a designer tie.He _ out the window and asked the shepherd,"If I tell you _ how many sheep you have here,will you give me one?" The shepherd looked at the man,then his peaceful sheep and _ answered,"Sure.Why not?" The young man _ his car,took out his _ ,connected it to his mobile phone,surfed to a page on the Internet where he called up a satellite navigation system . _ ,he printed out a fullcolor1,150page report on his hitech _ ,he turned to the shepherd and said,"You have exactly 1,586 sheep." "That's right." said the shepherd,"I guess you can _ one of my sheep." The shepherd then said to the young man,"Hey,if I can _ you exactly what your _ is,will you give me back my sheep?"The young man thought about it for a (an) _ and then said,"Okay, why not ?" "You are a consultant ," said the shepherd. "Wow! That's correct ." said the young man."But how did you _ that?" "No guessing required." answered the shepherd."You showed up here even though nobody called you,you want to get _ for an answer that I already knew,to a question I _ asked and it's obvious you don't know a thing about my business...Now give me back my sheep."
